sentence.Network_en: Crystal Spirit unseated his rider in the Berkshire Hurdle at Newbury.

sentence.Network_en: His horse fell at the final hurdle.
sentence.Network_cn: 他骑的马在最后一个跨栏倒下了。

sentence.Network_en: Two-thirds of candidates fail at this first hurdle and are packed off home.
sentence.Network_cn: 三分之二的候选人在第一个难关就败下阵来，只好打包回家了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hyrdel 'temporary fence', of Germanic origin; related to Dutch horde and German Hürde

encyclopedia.content: hurdle 英['hə:dl]美['hə:dl] n. 障碍；跳栏；临时活动篱笆 vt. 跨（栏），越过；克服（困难）；用篱笆围 n. 障碍；跳栏；临时活动篱笆 vt. 跨（栏），越过；克服（困难）；用篱笆围 时 态：hurdled,hurdling,hurdles 名 词：hur'dler 同反义词 参考例句 zambia's Samel Matitle won first place in the 400 meter hurdle, with an achievement of 48.22 seconds 赞比亚的萨姆埃尔·马泰特获得400米栏第一名，

entry.def: A hurdle is a problem, difficulty, or part of a process that may prevent you from achieving something.

example.ex: Two-thirds of candidates fail at this first hurdle and are packed off home...
example.tran: 三分之二的候选人在第一个难关就败下阵来，只好打包回家了。

example.ex: The weather will be the biggest hurdle so I have to be ready.
example.tran: 天气将会是最大的障碍，所以我必须要作好准备。

entry.def: Hurdles is a race in which people have to jump over a number of obstacles that are also called hurdles. You can use hurdles to refer to one or more races.

example.ex: Davis won the 400m. hurdles in a new Olympic time of 49.3 sec.
example.tran: 戴维斯以49.3秒的成绩刷新奥运会纪录，在400米跨栏赛跑中一举夺冠。

entry.def: If you hurdle, you jump over something while you are running.

example.ex: He crossed the lawn and hurdled the short fence...
example.tran: 他跑过草地，跳过低矮的栅栏。

example.ex: She learnt to hurdle by leaping over bales of hay on her family's farm.
example.tran: 她通过在自家农场里跳跨干草捆学会了跨栏。

means.word_mean: 1. a light movable barrier that competitors must leap over in certain races
2. an obstacle that you are expected to overcome;
3. the act of jumping over an obstacle

sentences.en: With her speed and agility, Cage cut out all her competitors in the hurdle race.
sentences.cn: 凯奇跨栏时速度快, 动作敏捷, 击败了其他所有选手。

sentences.en: In starting a new company, many hurdles must be crossed.
sentences.cn: 刚开办一个公司时, 必须克服许多障碍。

means.word_mean: 进行跨栏赛; 越过障碍
